title: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21) 1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case). This process should display a busy cursor.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the process is in progress.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Perform an action that triggers the update of the checked state of the table.
2. Observe that it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case).
3. Check if a busy cursor is displayed during this process.
